channel.title: Pvp Level stuck

item.title: Pvp Level stuck
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

When I go to the wilderness and logout and back in it shows what level in the wildy I am… when I tele anywhere it still has the wildy level I was at in the right hand lower corner… how do I make it update?

Here is my code:

public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public void WriteWildyLevel() { checkwildy2(); int oldlevel = WildyLevel; WildyLevel = (((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1); if(inwildy2 && WildyLevel != oldlevel) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("Level: "+WildyLevel, 199); leftwild = 1; } else if(!inwildy2 && leftwild == 1) { leftwild = 0; } }

Read full topic
